thread.title: Help regarding Bike Ride - Chandigarh - Srinagar - Leh Itinerary
thread.title_full: Help regarding Bike Ride - Chandigarh - Srinagar - Leh Itinerary

author: Vineet Palan
title: Help regarding Bike Ride - Chandigarh - Srinagar - Leh Itinerary
text: # 2 Too much travelling I would say and you are giving no time to your body for acclimatization. Sleeping at Kargil is a good idea but again its better to give a day more at Leh. Hunder to Pangong via Wari La and Pangong to Tsomoriri are long drives, and specially in that altitude, it might not be a good option to go for. Again give a more day in between. With this itinerary you may be able to cover places with nearly given up bodies but won't be able to enjoy the beauty of Ladakh.
